channel.title: Lifetime deal for Startups.com is available
channel.description:
I've just noticed a lifetime deal for Startups.com for $49. Apparently it ends in 2 days.
[https://deals.neowin.net/sales/startups-com-unlimited-lifetime-subscription-2](https://deals.neowin.net/sales/startups-com-unlimited-lifetime-subscription-2)
Has anyone else used this before? Is it useful?
Thanks, Gareth.
